sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import 'react-phone-input-2/lib/style.css'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { listMentorDetails } from '../redux/actions/mentorActions'; import SignUpModal from './join-mentokart/SignUpModal'; import Modal from 'react-modal'; import Footer from './footer/Footer'; import MyNavbar from './header-section/MyNavbar'; const MentorProfile = (props) => { const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); const loggedIn = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('userInfo')); const showModalBtn = (bool) => { setShowModal(bool); }; const dispatch = useDispatch(); const mentorDetails = useSelector((state) => state.mentorDetailsList); const { mentorDetail } = mentorDetails; const { user, userDetail, user_achievement, user_experience, user_testimonial, menteerating, } = mentorDetail; // console.log(mentorDetail); useEffect(() => { window.scroll(0, 0); dispatch(listMentorDetails(props.match.params.id)); }, [dispatch, props.match]); return (

MENTOR PROFILE

{user?.first_name + ' ' + user?.middle_name + ' ' + user?.last_name}

Designation:{' '} {user?.designation}
Industry:{' '} {userDetail?.industry}
{user?.user_categories.split(',').join(' | ')}
{/*

4.5

(200 reviews)
*/}
{ if (loggedIn === null) { setShowModal(true); } else { window.location = `http://mentorkart.org/mentorkart?SSO_Mtoken=${loggedIn}&domain=https://mentorkart-new-ui.netlify.app`; } }} className='showcase-card one' >

Mentor Me

For 3 Months

Rs 10000/-

Coming soon
{ setShowModal(true); }} className='showcase-card two' >

Mentor Me

For 3 Months

Rs 10000/-

Coming Soon

{user?.about}

    {user_experience && user_experience.map((experience, index) => { return (
  • {experience.title} at{' '} {experience.organisation}{' '}

    {experience.description}

    • ); })}
{/*

    {user_achievement && user_achievement.map((achievement, index) => { return (
  • {achievement.name} on {achievement.year}{' '}

    {achievement.description}

    • ); })}

    {user_testimonial && user_testimonial.map((testimonial, index) => { return (

  • {testimonial.description}

    {' '} ~ {testimonial.given_by} on{' '} {testimonial.year}{' '}
    • ); })}
*/}
setShowModal(false)} style={{ overlay: { zIndex: '5000', }, content: { maxWidth: '1100px', margin: 'auto', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', borderRadius: '15px', }, }} >
); }; export default MentorProfile;
